title: Perma ban and unfair behaviour of riOT
body: Ok as many users i got after 4 years perma ban. On my account where i spent hundreds of $ to support RIOT. I spent on my acc over 5000 hours.  Can you imagine the time i was building my profile and how many games i had to play? There was good games and there were bad games. Ofc there is a type of people that can´t handle words and i am one of them... From the other side i didn´t go troll afk or something so i would made the game bad. I had chat ban for more over 4000 games... It was really good becouse i was able to play and i had no chance to type with others...If this was continuing i would never get perma ban. But Clever RIOT after some patch deleted this chat restriction and i get my words again....And ofc i got perma ban. And iam asking why you want to do this? I am not bad player.... I just sometimes can´t handle dumb people.....If iam perma muted it´s ok..I play anyway on other account but with that difference i will never ever put my $ in. !!!!!! But biggest responsibility was that riot took that chat restriction..i didn´t asked for that....everything is ruined....RIOT should think about solving problems not runing from them...and i think that perma ban is worse then chat restriction becouse people simply make new acc and go on...With chat restriction they just stop being toxic but still can do everything good for game even for riot. I wish i could get my acc back. This is just pure robbery of people shame on you
